Class Peer

    • Peer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Peer.keepAlive
      Class used to send keep alive messages to peer every 2 minutes to prevent peers from closing connections.

      • handshake

        public boolean handshake()
        Generates a handshake to send to the peer.
        Returns:
        True if handshake between peers is equal. Otherwise, return false.

      • checkFileAndGetIndex

        public int checkFileAndGetIndex()
        Checks if the file to be saved has been started already. If so, reads all pieces from the save file to the downloaded file array by verifying its SHA-1 hash. Returns the index of the piece if verifying its SHA-1 hash value fails.
        Returns:
        int This returns index of piece

      • download

        public void download()
        Downloads all pieces and verifies its SHA-1 hash value. Client can enter to stop download whenever and pieces will still be saved.

      • verifySHA1

        public boolean verifySHA1(byte[] piece,
                          int count)
        Obtains a specific piece and verifies its SHA-1 hash value.
        Parameters:
        piece -
        count -
        Returns:
        True if SHA-1 is verified. False otherwise.

      • calculateAverageRTT

        public double calculateAverageRTT()
        Sends out a ping to the peers ip address and calculates its average RTT over 10 times.
        Returns:
        double

        public byte[] getPeerID()
